plot: After the death of the matriarch from a strong french coastal community, the funeral brings family together for the funeral. This rekindles a forbidden love.
title: La cousine
plot_es: After the death of the matriarch from a strong french coastal community, the funeral brings family together for the funeral. This rekindles a forbidden love.
plot_en: After the death of the matriarch from a strong french coastal community, the funeral brings family together for the funeral. This rekindles a forbidden love.
